# [Interview #806: Brandon Sanderson's Blog: Interviews + Updates, Entry #1](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=806#1)

#### Brandon Sanderson

The most recent ALCATRAZ VERSUS THE EVIL LIBRARIANS annotation covers the
[penultimate chapter](http://brandonsanderson.com/annotation/463/)
, including the meaning of the name "Rashid" as in the Sands of Rashid.
